channel.title: Monitoring & Control: Actions on Repton Projects

item.title: Monitoring & Control: Actions
item.description: Actions Create and allocate tasks to your project team Tracking Progress Record all key project tasks. Prioritise tasks based on impact on project. Assign tasks to individual project team members. Use review and due dates to monitor progress. Free Trial » View on Dashboard Use Pending Actions on the dashboard to execute assigned tasks. Free Trial » Search Actions Use Action Management's customisable search feature to easily locate specific tasks.
